definition.zh_def: 白色的，無色的，通常與純淨、清晰或光明相關。
definition.en_def: The color of milk or fresh snow, due to the reflection of most wavelengths of visible light; often associated with purity and cleanliness.
definition.example: The walls of the room were painted white to make it look brighter.
